name: Websites
description: Start from scratch or convert your outdated website into a modern web 2.0 website that works on mobile and desktop devices making use of the latest technologies browsers have to offer.
examples: Conversion of graphic design into working template.
Templates & themes for existing CMS software.

name: Integrations
description: Bring exciting and new open-source third-party services to your existing web application by integrating them using API technology.
examples: Remote data storage & backup related services.

name: Servers
description: Web applications are useless without a dedicated and reliable place to host them from that is secure and has all the capabilities your app needs.

name: Automation
description: If you find yourself repeating the same tasks everyday on new data as part of your workday, there might be a way to use scripts and services to automate these tasks so you have more free time to do something else.
examples: Custom backend CMS for your data.
